sentences.en: Ache light, crouch a little while, touch a little while, good also.
sentences.cn: 疼轻了, 蹲一会儿, 抵一会儿, 也就好了.

sentences.en: Eventually, Barty Crouch Jr. threw off the Imperius Curse.
sentences.cn: 最终, 小巴蒂?克劳奇摆脱了夺魂咒.

sentences.en: Friend, face the blackness, stand to keep, do not crouch down.
sentences.cn: 朋友, 面对黑暗, 站直了, 别趴下.

sentences.en: He crouched in the shadows near the doorway.
sentences.cn: 他蹲在门道近旁的阴暗处。

sentences.en: He dropped into a defensive crouch, the knife held defensively before him.
sentences.cn: 他做出防备的卷曲姿态, 刀很防备地拿在面前.

sentences.en: He was running in a low crouch, weaving between the trees.
sentences.cn: 他一直以屈膝前进, 在树林间穿梭.

sentences.en: If a nuclear exchange began, children were to crouch beneath their desks.
sentences.cn: 如果美苏开始相互核攻击, 孩子们就要蹲到课桌下面.

sentences.en: One guy said he would play with Crouch and Bellamy.
sentences.cn: 有个人说他会上克劳奇和贝拉米.

sentences.en: Paula crouched down and held her hands out to the fire.
sentences.cn: 葆拉蹲下来，把手伸向火堆。

sentences.en: Playing Rooney and Owen means no place for Crouch.
sentences.cn: 让鲁尼和欧文上场就意味着克劳奇要坐板凳.

sentences.en: So I never had any doubt they would play Crouch and Kuyt.
sentences.cn: 所以我知道他们一定会派上克劳奇和库伊特的.

sentences.en: The difference was Crouch, we just did not handle him at all.
sentences.cn: 克劳奇是最大的差异, 我们根本看不住他.

sentences.en: The fielders crouch around the batsman's wicket.
sentences.cn: 防守队员蹲伏在击球手守卫的三柱门周围。

sentences.en: They did not crouch under the oppression.
They walked in a crouch, each bent over close to the ground.
sentences.cn: 他们每个人都俯身贴近地面蹲伏着前进。

sentences.en: What shapeless lump is that, bent, crouch'd there on the sand?
sentences.cn: 那在沙上弯着腰, 抱头跌坐的一大堆是什么?

sentences.en: Would you crouch down a bit'so that I look taller?
sentences.cn: 你能不能蹲低一点让我看起来高一点?

trans.tran_en: to lower your body close to the ground by bending your knees completely
to lower your body close to the ground by bending your knees completely
to lower your body close to the ground by bending your knees completely
